attributes.action: Prevent the closure of Lybster Swimming Pool at Lybster Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Short sighted cuts are removing an essential facility from a rural community with the impact on current future generations of children.
At a time when the governments are trying to encourage child health and wellbeing and talking of an NHS "time bomb" from poor health it seems a complete contradiction to remove such facilities.
The short term minor cost cutting will have a significant and long lasting impact on this and surrounding communities.

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
